conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully converts to an isometric 3D cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D transformation with clear volume and wall thickness; slight perspective softening on far corners.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major rooms and stairs are present, but wall topology near the bathroom/closet area is simplified and inaccurate to the source lines.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen and major furniture types are represented, though the bedroom bed is replaced by a small block and stairs changed orientation.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render, but the 3D text labels baked into the floor plan deduct presentation points as they create visual clutter.

detected_errors.description: Bathroom and partition wall geometry does not match the precise layout of the 2D plan.
Garbled text labels present on the 3D floor surface.
The large bed in the bedroom is represented by a small bedside-sized table/block.

summary: A successful 3D projection that maintains the core architectural layout but suffers from baked-in text and simplified interior partition geometry.
